select t.partnerId, t.partnerCode, t.createDate, t.secretKey, t.password, t.isLock, t.isProvider, t.notes, t.validIps, t.mailAddress, t.partnerName, t.phone, t.jarName, t.className, t.keepSession, t.sessionValue, t.isConnected, t.businessContactName KD_HoTen, t.businessContactEmail KD_Email, t.businessContactPhone KD_DT, t.techniqueContactName KT_HoTen, t.techniqueContactEmail KT_Email, t.techniqueContactPhone KT_DT, t.compareContactName DS_HoTen, t.compareContactEmail DS_Email, t.compareContactPhone DS_DT from partner t where true
AND isLock = #isLock#
AND partnerCode = #partnerCode#
AND isProvider = $isProvider$
AND keepSession = #keepSession#
sqlMap.update: update partner set isConnected = #isConnected# where partnerCode = #partnerCode#
